cloud.description: settings for accessing data from cloud storage

workspace.description: settings for accessing data from workspaces

name.description: the alias name of the cloud account, referenced from setting values

accessName.description: the accessName for the cloud account

storageType.description: the storageType of the cloud account

name.description: the alias name of this cloud container

containerId.description: the containerId of this cloud container

accountName.description: the account name for this cloud container. Must be an entry in "cloud/accounts"

gcs/default/databases.description: List of GCS workspace database aliases loaded by default. Must be entries in "workspace/databases".

name.description: the alias name of the workspace database

dbName.description: the name of the database within its cloud container

includePrerelease.description: include prerelease version as acceptable versions

priority.description: for sorted databases, higher values are searched first

prefetch.description: if true, pre-fetch all of the data from the cloud in the background
